subtitles:
184372 187041 - Oh, God.
- Keep your shit together.
187124 190210 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

191046 193715 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it.

218909 221746 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

221830 225662 If you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

225751 230994 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

231090 234542 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

243144 246313 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

248443 252738 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
252823 254401 We'll get you out of here.

254492 259153 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
276516 278639 Get it off! Get it off!

282271 285476 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her.

294160 297363 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now.

1003112 1005983 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up.

1014123 1016698 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1044032 1047616 - Let's go. Let's go.
- What the fuck is going on?

1077610 1082357 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1084535 1089743 The man goes to leave and the barman says
"You can't leave that lying there."
1089833 1093878 He says "It's not a lion. It's a giraffe".
1104474 1107392 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1114194 1117693 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1122285 1128704 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1128793 1134547 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm hallucinating.

1158117 1164370 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1164457 1168621 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1169505 1172256 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1172340 1177051 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1180933 1183770 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1186398 1188889 There was something in the blood.

1190362 1195320 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1202458 1205162 And that's when the exodus started.

1209382 1213047 there were reports of Infection
in Paris and New York.
1215431 1218348 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1221312 1224266 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1226901 1230982 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane.

1231073 1235367 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1236828 1239914 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1240542 1244705 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1263108 1267107 I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it.
1267196 1269769 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1284548 1288962 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1291473 1295554 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1299731 1303316 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together.

1318003 1321169 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1348077 1351910 - If there's anyone in there who...
- I understand.

1485563 1489513 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1495992 1500487 My parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1503124 1508463 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1509090 1511461 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1511550 1514884 even though cash was completely useless.
1516430 1519551 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1525107 1527433 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1529611 1531937 I remember the ground was soft.

1533909 1538286 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1538371 1542321 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1542417 1546368 Somewhere in the crowd
there were Infected. It spread fast.

1546464 1549798 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1551428 1554511 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1554597 1556970 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1559270 1564229 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1564317 1568184 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1582295 1587455 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1590137 1592972 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1593056 1596391 We'll all sleep in the same room. It's safer.
1699091 1701380 Give me a drink of that, will ya?
1710270 1712347 I'll start working on them, then.

1745809 1748764 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1748855 1751062 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1754318 1757274 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1795115 1797190 Do you have any clothes here?

1800286 1803952 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1804041 1807706 More Infected will be coming.
They always do.

1836493 1839495 How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1839580 1843495 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1843585 1848959 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1849048 1853462 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1853553 1858680 It might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1858769 1864190 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1864274 1868486 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans?

1868571 1873031 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world orjust fall in love and fuck?
1875704 1878277 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1937021 1940142 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1940234 1943317 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1961256 1963333 Now I do need a break.

1983114 1988405 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1989621 1993868 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1996170 1998412 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1998506 2003584 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

2009309 2013224 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2089732 2092733 - Open the fucking door.
- Where's Dad?
2092819 2095107 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2130444 2133978 Good to meet you.
This is my daughter Hannah.
2146879 2149168 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2149256 2152292 Why don't you all sit down and...
2152384 2155339 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2155430 2157921 We've got Mum's crème de menthe.

2168903 2171904 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2171989 2174860 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2197643 2200727 I know it isn't much, but cheers.

2229553 2235141 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2236811 2239053 You'll have to use the bucket.
2245613 2248234 Have to empty it each morning.

2248323 2251990 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2253872 2256993 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2270348 2272722 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2309434 2313135 - So what do you make of them?
- They're desperate.
2314272 2317108 Probably need us more than we need them.

2328414 2333075 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2333168 2336917 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2341386 2344921 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2360991 2364241 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2366121 2370120 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2402328 2404404 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2404497 2408626 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2408710 2411914 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2428398 2432646 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2432737 2436486 Saw it on TV once, but I can't make it work.
2452550 2455671 We're not going to be able to stay here.

2464605 2468354 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2468443 2473022 Salvation is here.
The answer to Infection is here.
2473115 2476116 If you can hear this, you're not alone.

2476202 2480699 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2480790 2482997 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2486463 2491042 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2494639 2498553 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now itjust repeats.
2501104 2504022 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2507779 2512572 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2518456 2524542 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2524630 2527798 - I didn't...
- It's OK. It's the truth.
2527884 2530375 I can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2530470 2534419 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2536310 2540604 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2540689 2544190 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection.

2544277 2548571 There is no answer.
It's already done all the damage it can.

2548656 2551493 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2551577 2555657 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying.

2560128 2565834 Anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2569305 2574595 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2575312 2577388 We have to try and get there.

2591538 2595287 Just so you know,
I don't take cheques or credit cards.

2623865 2626866 - What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2626952 2632195 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2649810 2652302 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2653189 2656559 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2656651 2661029 We're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars.
2661115 2664033 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea.
2699698 2702107 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2702202 2705536 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2708041 2710201 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.
2724810 2728346 Do you hear that? Hey, do you hear that?

2760350 2764643 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2764729 2767980 Grab hold. One, two, three, lift!

2774449 2779574 - Don't look at them.
- I can see them. They're coming.

2790467 2793384 - Get the tyre on.
- I'm trying.

2806777 2809232 - Get in the car.
- Come on.
2885739 2889322 Don't take anything that needs to be cooked.
2889410 2891236 I think you can eat that raw.

2898919 2903416 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.
2919860 2923109 "Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth."
2978007 2981092 Either we do this now or we're walking.
3033318 3035988 Like going on holidays with your aunt.

3134139 3136926 - Find anything?
- No. Let's get outta here.
3212893 3215893 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.

3280842 3284544 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3284639 3288802 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3289853 3293685 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3304660 3306950 I was thinking I was wrong.

3318384 3322882 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...
3324266 3327718 she's got her dad and he's got his daughter.

3330397 3334016 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.

3357928 3361925 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3390256 3392925 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3409735 3413603 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3413698 3417992 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3420706 3423280 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3423376 3427077 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3427172 3429414 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3441896 3444601 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3445692 3449690 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3526615 3529402 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3584720 3588221 - Did I miss breakfast?
- You'll sleep through anything.

3588308 3593304 - Did you have a fry-up?
- We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door.
3617883 3622380 Our location is the 42nd blockade, the M602,
3629854 3632891 The answer to Infection is here.
3669231 3672600 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3674445 3676771 No fire crews to put it out.
3807759 3811758 I don't understand, Dad. Did they leave?

3811848 3814967 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No.

3821816 3826645 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3943076 3945994 - Dad?
- Keep away from me. Keep away from me.
3946080 3948570 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
4011818 4014488 Three survivors. One male, two female.
4014572 4017906 I repeat, one male, two female.

4082731 4087607 We've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
4087695 4090103 You can all have a shower.
4090197 4093531 You look like you need one. Please.

4113473 4118682 It ain't funny. I got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris.
4127489 4130656 She's lost her dad. That's how she is.

4142965 4146547 Don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

4150390 4155384 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

4155478 4159393 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
4160692 4163100 I want her to be OK.
4164696 4166856 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
4166950 4169737 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4209871 4213371 - We did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4213459 4219580 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4222010 4226174 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4230687 4235183 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4235566 4238485 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4238571 4241690 The fire drove hundreds of Infected
out of Manchester.
4241782 4244866 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4254922 4260794 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4264516 4268763 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4268853 4273516 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4276779 4281691 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4281785 4284193 The belly of the house. The heart.

4284287 4289531 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4291795 4293919 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4294007 4297211 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Give us some.

4297302 4301347 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4303892 4306893 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4331297 4336375 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4344062 4348107 The idea was to learn something
about Infection.
4370800 4374216 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4385858 4391233 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the Infected take to starve to death.
4430992 4433447 You'll have to wait and see
4435872 4438446 We hope it's chips, it's chips
4454852 4458220 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4465822 4468277 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4468366 4471570 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4471662 4474782 but this omelette will do just as well.

4490348 4494264 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4494354 4497769 I thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4504740 4507527 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4508368 4513826 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4513917 4518461 What a fucking disappointment.
I saw those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4518547 4521797 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.

4524804 4528849 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4528933 4533263 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4533355 4536475 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4538569 4542698 Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4543450 4545905 So if the infection wipes us all out,

4553210 4556212 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah.
4556298 4559547 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4562429 4567637 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4570438 4574566 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since Infection.

4577362 4581906 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
Infection, the four weeks before that...

4581993 4587449 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4587540 4591158 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4599470 4602424 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4605393 4608644 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4609564 4612685 He's one of the people you're talking about.

4670632 4674250 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt.
4690946 4693235 I ain't never seen that in my life.

4715891 4721514 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4721605 4723813 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4725609 4730900 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4732534 4734693 - That's an offer.
- Give her some.

4740919 4745414 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4753140 4756177 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4756268 4759720 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4770200 4772906 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4775790 4778363 The rest of you, go with him.

4800775 4804988 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4805073 4806615 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4806700 4811861 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.

4833895 4838688 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4859675 4863459 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4864638 4869348 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4869436 4872306 What could I say to him?

4872397 4877605 We fight off the Infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4878529 4882361 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4882451 4888571 I moved us from the blockade, I set the radio
broadcasting and I promised them women.

4906142 4908136 - What is it?
- We have to go.
4916237 4918195 We get in the car and we go.

4919574 4924118 No! You're not going to keep them here.
You've got to let them go.

4924205 4927455 You can't keep them here.
Stay where you are.
4927542 4930247 I'm not gonna let you keep them here.
4944185 4946511 I want to give you a chance.
4950358 4952647 But I can't let them go.

4980725 4983477 Smithers says
"Women and semen don't mix."

4983562 4986480 Mr Burns says
"We all know what you think, Smithers."

4986565 4989483 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4989569 4993186 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4993280 4997695 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons.

4997785 5001071 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

5001164 5006871 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane.

5007922 5011967 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
5013345 5016465 Just imagine, just think about it.
5017515 5019805 How could Infection cross the oceans?

5019894 5024187 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

5024273 5026979 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

5027069 5031066 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

5035370 5038952 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

5047716 5052094 "There is no Infection.
It's just people killing people." He's insane.

5098648 5101768 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

5102860 5107986 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

5108075 5111990 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
5115834 5117910 Get up, you cunt. Fucking move.

5142905 5146321 Come on then, you fucking pansies.
Do me first.
5146409 5148900 No, Mitch. Just use the gat.

5148995 5152031 - So you're gonna stick me?
- Shoot 'em.

5154877 5157913 Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

5158005 5159914 - I'll shoot them.
- No, you won't.

5160007 5163459 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

5172771 5176721 You stupid cunt. What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

5176818 5180982 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you.
- Where's he fucking gone?
5182240 5185076 Fuck it. Get up. Get after him.

5187580 5190783 - Jones, move it.
- I can see him. I can see him.

5200552 5203470 - Can you see him?
- Through there.
5217947 5221398 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5260452 5264403 The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5264499 5268081 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5268169 5270707 which she certainly has no use for.
5271713 5273541 You can't do it to Hannah.

5273633 5277334 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.
5290860 5293648 Come on. It's only dressing up.

5293738 5297108 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5315847 5319975 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5321854 5325554 - Listen. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5325649 5329813 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5353597 5356467 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5379543 5383492 We're gonna eat these, Hannah.
Come on. Eat these.
5383588 5385748 Are you trying to kill me?
5402693 5405362 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5411203 5413775 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5643876 5646333 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5647380 5651331 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5654095 5656718 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5669905 5672397 I think they're having an effect.

5687967 5690838 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5691596 5694681 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5694767 5696759 Is that the way it works?

5700314 5704394 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5723340 5726460 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5726552 5729387 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5752622 5757533 Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5764968 5768338 Don'tjust stand there,
you soppy cunt. Get after them.
5790790 5793743 What the fuck you gonna do now?
5820321 5824071 Defend these stairs with your fucking life.

6002816 6007194 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets.

6070599 6075391 It's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

6075479 6079940 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
6080026 6082351 And we'll live happy ever after.
6146725 6149217 That was longer than a heartbeat.
6172796 6175287 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

6175382 6178715 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
6187228 6190811 Hannah, it's OK. He's not infected.
6190899 6192975 I thought he was biting you.

6193068 6197565 - I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
- It's a long story.
6197657 6200195 We have to get out of here. Come on.
6298517 6300926 Come on, Jim, breathe. Fucking breathe.
6394667 6397336 You looked all right in this, you know.

6418985 6422319 - I can't hear anything.
- I told you, I heard it.
6477800 6480718 Do you think he saw us this time?
